SETUP.description: Project initialization, environment setup, codebase preparation
tasks: Set up Python environment and dependencies
Create baseline dataset loaders for matrix inversion

subtasks: Train baseline IRED model on matrix inversion
Implement 2D energy landscape slicing with filter normalization
Generate gradient field visualizations
Compute Hessian eigenvalues at sampled points
Create landscape comparison plots (baseline vs. different seeds)
Quantify convexity, basin sharpness, spurious minima
Extract hidden activations from EBM (all layers) on dataset
Implement SAE training with recent scaling tricks (ICLR 2025)
Train SAEs per layer with varying sparsity
Perform feature importance ranking
Analyze top features: what matrix properties correlate?
Create feature visualization and concept naming
Implement Integrated Gradients attribution method
Compute input-output attribution heatmaps
Train concept classifiers for matrix properties
Implement Visual-TCAV concept vector discovery
Find interpretable directions via PCA in gradient space
Create intervention validation experiments
Test causality of discovered directions
Implement SPD manifold distance metrics
Analyze energy landscape on manifold
Decompose energy by eigenvalue vs. eigenvector space
Compute geodesic-aware gradients
Analyze optimal transport perspective
Validate geometric alignment of learned features
Implement layer-wise linear probes (ProbeGen style)
Test separability of matrix properties per layer
Analyze gradient flow: layer-to-layer magnitude
Decompose energy contribution by layer
Identify computational bottlenecks and redundancy
Create layer criticality ranking
Implement intervention validation on discovered directions
Conduct influence function analysis (KFAC approximation)
Run sanity checks: orthogonal direction should have no effect
Test OOD generalization (larger matrices, different conditioning)
Measure interpretability robustness across initializations
Document failure modes and edge cases
Compare energy landscapes: baseline vs. random vs. adversarial mining
Measure landscape sharpness changes under mining strategies
Analyze persistence of interpretable directions across strategies
Evaluate SAE feature quality under different mining
Propose property-guided mining improvements
Final synthesis and recommendation writing

notes.research_framework: 7-phase mechanistic interpretability study using SAEs, gradient attribution, causal interventions, and Riemannian geometry
